structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.text:
Before July 1, 2005, the board may issue a certificate as a surgical assistant to an applicant who:
Meets the requirements set forth in KRS 311.878(2); and
Provides documentation that the applicant has passed a surgical or first assistant examination required for certification by one (1) of the following:
The National Surgical Assistant Association;
The Liaison Council on Certification for the Surgical Technologist; or
The American Board of Surgical Assistants.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 10, effective July 13, 2004.
